article_title: Environmentalism, Trade Policy Show Liberal Hypocrisy On Helping The Poor

article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman

og.description: Liberals claim to be passionate defenders of the poor, yet many of their advocated policies actually harm the poor. Intellectual consistency seems to be lacking from their playbook.
